answers.answer: It's possible you have a uti, bladder infection, or kidney stones. You really need to see a doctor to make sure your kidney's are doing ok asap. If you get a high fever go to the ER.
perhaps you have kidney stones. I would go to a doctor if I were you.

question: im passing alot of urine day and night but when i wake in the morning i have awful pains in my kidney area going from my back right through to my stomach im also always tired
title: pains and pressure over passing urine
